00033 /*

00052 
00053 #ifndef PAP_H
00054 #define PAP_H
00055 
00056 /*************************
00057 *** PUBLIC DEFINITIONS ***
00058 *************************/
00059 /*
00060  * Packet header = Code, id, length.
00061  */
00062 #define UPAP_HEADERLEN  (sizeof (u_char) + sizeof (u_char) + sizeof (u_short))
00063 
00064 
00065 /*
00066  * UPAP codes.
00067  */
00068 #define UPAP_AUTHREQ    1       /* Authenticate-Request */
00069 #define UPAP_AUTHACK    2       /* Authenticate-Ack */
00070 #define UPAP_AUTHNAK    3       /* Authenticate-Nak */
00071 
00072 /*
00073  * Client states.
00074  */
00075 #define UPAPCS_INITIAL  0       /* Connection down */
00076 #define UPAPCS_CLOSED   1       /* Connection up, haven't requested auth */
00077 #define UPAPCS_PENDING  2       /* Connection down, have requested auth */
00078 #define UPAPCS_AUTHREQ  3       /* We've sent an Authenticate-Request */
00079 #define UPAPCS_OPEN             4       /* We've received an Ack */
00080 #define UPAPCS_BADAUTH  5       /* We've received a Nak */
00081 
00082 /*
00083  * Server states.
00084  */
00085 #define UPAPSS_INITIAL  0       /* Connection down */
00086 #define UPAPSS_CLOSED   1       /* Connection up, haven't requested auth */
00087 #define UPAPSS_PENDING  2       /* Connection down, have requested auth */
00088 #define UPAPSS_LISTEN   3       /* Listening for an Authenticate */
00089 #define UPAPSS_OPEN             4       /* We've sent an Ack */
00090 #define UPAPSS_BADAUTH  5       /* We've sent a Nak */
00091 
00092 
00093 /************************
00094 *** PUBLIC DATA TYPES ***
00095 ************************/
00096 
00097 /*
00098  * Each interface is described by upap structure.
00099  */
00100 typedef struct upap_state {
00101     int us_unit;                        /* Interface unit number */
00102     const char *us_user;        /* User */
00103     int us_userlen;                     /* User length */
00104     const char *us_passwd;      /* Password */
00105     int us_passwdlen;           /* Password length */
00106     int us_clientstate;         /* Client state */
00107     int us_serverstate;         /* Server state */
00108     u_char us_id;                       /* Current id */
00109     int us_timeouttime;         /* Timeout (seconds) for auth-req retrans. */
00110     int us_transmits;           /* Number of auth-reqs sent */
00111     int us_maxtransmits;        /* Maximum number of auth-reqs to send */
00112     int us_reqtimeout;          /* Time to wait for auth-req from peer */
00113 } upap_state;
00114 
00115 
00116 /***********************
00117 *** PUBLIC FUNCTIONS ***
00118 ***********************/
00119 
00120 extern upap_state upap[];
00121 
00122 void upap_setloginpasswd(int unit, const char *luser, const char *lpassword);
00123 void upap_authwithpeer (int, char *, char *);
00124 void upap_authpeer (int);
00125 
00126 extern struct protent pap_protent;
00127 
00128 #endif /* PAP_H */
00129
